snippet: India's finance secretary contends that the Vodafone Group owes about $3.7 billion in taxes and late fees stemming from its $11 billion acquisition of local mobile phone operations from Hutchison Whampoa in 2007, Heather Timmons reports on the India...
abstract: India's finance secretary contends that the Vodafone Group owes about $3.7 billion in taxes and late fees stemming from its $11 billion acquisition of local mobile phone operations from Hutchison Whampoa in 2007, Heather Timmons reports on the India Ink blog.

headline.main: India Presses Vodafone on Deal Taxes
